CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Salutation, "Rabbanit"), ISPICKVAL(Salutation , "Rabba"), ISPICKVAL(Salutation , "Rabbi"), ISPICKVAL(Salutation , "Rabbi Dr."), ISPICKVAL(Salutation , "Cantor"), ISPICKVAL(Salutation , "Hazzan"), ISPICKVAL(Salutation , "Maharat") ), TRUE, if ( Clergy_Override__c = TRUE, TRUE, False) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked if the Contact's salutation is set to Rabbi, Rabbi Dr., Rabbanit, Cantor, Hazzan or Maharatif, or the "Clergy Override" box is checked.
CustomField.label: Clergy
